Articles.Content:
Challenge:Make a spacecraft with only ion engines that can flyby Eve and Gilly at least 3 times you can only use non-ion engines when launching spacecraft into Kerbin orbit all other burns must be done only with stock ion engines.

Rules:Mods allowed: RemoteTech,TAC life support,USI life support,Kerbal Atachment System,Kerbal Inventory System,Interstelar KSP and ewreything elese ecsept Hyper Edit and RSS.

GOAL:to win this challenge you must flyby Eve and or Gilly (you can do both) As much times as possible.

Bonus:Manned +2points

 More than 3 kerbals +6

 Weight under 18 tons +7

 100% Reusable +5

 Using TAC life support and RemoteTech together +9 Good Luck ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This may turn out to be very long and boring challenge.

Gilly assist -> Eve aerobraking -> Gilly assist > Eve aerobraking - with corrective maneuvers of some 15m/s per pass, this could take a very long time.

Or if you define "flyby" as merely entering SOI of given body (just as the game does) just enter Eve's retrograde orbit that skirts the very edge of Gilly's SOI so that it would hardly affect your orbit (and correct from time to time).
Can I use regular engines for launching the ship out of Kerbin orbit? The ion engines are bad for that.
